Changelog

2016

  • Oct 6 - Show detailed type of web browser and operating system using UAParser.js.

  • Oct 2 - Add Share Buttons.

  • Oct 1 - Add IcoMoon - pixel perfect icon solutions.

  • Sept 13 - Add the Github logo to site header, and change color to blue when hovering over it.

  • Sept 11 - Build a xmuGoogle map using Google Maps API.

  • Sept 10 - Add qTip2. The second generation of the advanced qTip plugin for the ever popular jQuery framework.

  • Sept 8 - Add PhotoSwipe - a JavaScript image gallery for mobile and desktop.

  • Sept 5 - Build the full-text search engine using lunr.js.

  • Aug 15 - Add Fon Awesome.

  • Aug 13 - Add Google Analytics.

  • Aug 9 - My Jekyll blog launched, which is hosted on Github Pages.
